Package lu.uni.geko.ext.ifc

The base package for an extension that customises GeKo, a generic model weaver, for IFC building models.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
IfcConnector /** A utility class hiding details of the EMF / IFC bridge implementation.
IfcConstants A utility class containing all the constants of the IFC extension.
IfcCopier An implementation of the interface Copier that is used by the extension point lu.uni.geko.weaver.copy.copierfactoryext handling the generation of identifiers and setting of the owner history for IFC building models.
IfcCopierFactory An extension for the extension point CopierFactoryExt that provides access to IfcCopier.
IfcFeatureIgnorer An extension for the FeatureIgnorerExt extension point that makes sure that some feature values are not taken into account during join point detection and model comparison.
IfcGenModelModifier An extension for the extension point GenModelModifierExt that makes sure that the code for the IFC metamodel is generated with the correct parameters.
IfcResourceLoader An extension of the extension point RefinedResourceLoaderExt that is responsible for loading IFC building models.
IfcSimpleAdder An extension for the extension point SimpleAdderExt that returns the right containment reference of the part 21 model for model elements to be added.
T  
 

Package lu.uni.geko.ext.ifc Description

The base package for an extension that customises GeKo, a generic model weaver, for IFC building models.
